channel.title: Aravind Adiga on Darshit Patel's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Aravind Adiga on Darshit Patel's Blog

item.title: The White Tiger, by Aravind Adiga - A Review
item.description: The White Tiger will leave you breathless, revolted, and disgusted. It'll make you cynical, and a pessimist. It'll anger you, sadden you, and make you despair.
